name: Anno 1800 - Vehicle Liveries Pack
description:
Technically the first skins pack, it's also the 4th cosmetic pack of Anno 1800.

Rule in style and give your fleet a visual refresh with over 30 new cosmetic skins for your ships, trains, and airships.

The celebratory new “Parade” and fierce “Conqueror” skin lines can be applied to customize any ship in your fleet.

Enjoy even more visual variety on your railroad tracks, thanks to new skins for your trains.

As a bonus, owners of “The Passage” DLC will also find new skins to change the look of their majestic airships.

Vehicle skins can be changed at any time during gameplay and can be individually selected for each individual ship, train, and airship to give you maximum flexibility with regards to your fleets’ looks.
